section.title: Add child cards from parent card
section.p: You can create child cards from a parent card.

item.p: Open a card that is in a tree and can have children cards associated with it. The tree properties for the parent card will be listed on the card.
Click on the + link that appears.

section.p: After you click the + Add new Card link, you will be shown the tree quick add box.

item.p: By default, the cards will be created as the next available card type in the tree. To change the card type of the cards which are added, select the card type link at the top of the quick add box.
item.note: You will only be able to select card types which can be added under the card you are adding cards to. You can select any card type in the tree when adding cards to the top of the tree.

item.p: By default, you can add five cards to the tree using the quick add box. To add more than five cards, select the + link.

section.p: After adding the names of the cards you want to add, select, Save from the quick add box to add the cards to the tree.
